system.requirements:
Tier 1; Stealth Skill 
Aptitudes: Agility, Field Craft
system.effect: The Character's attacks against Unaware targets inflict +1 damage per 2 Degrees of Success on the Weapon Skill or Ballistic Skill beyond the first (aka DoS 3, 5, 7, etc)

description.value: The Character's attacks against Unaware targets inflict +1 damage per 2 Degrees of Success on the Weapon Skill or Ballistic Skill beyond the first (aka DoS 3, 5, 7, etc)
